item.title: 巴西意外改税后中国抢购美国大豆
item.description: 世界最大的大豆出口国巴西出人意料地改变了税收，这促使中国买家抢购美国的大豆供应。【原文：A surprise tax change in Brazil, the world’s largest soybean exporter, is prompting Chinese buyers to snatch up US supplies.】

item.title: 冷藏公司 Lineage 据称寻求 30 亿美元以上的首次公开募股
item.description: 熟悉内情的人士透露，物流巨头 Lineage 正寻求在美国首次公开募股中融资 30 多亿美元，这将是今年规模最大的一次上市。【原文：Logistics giant Lineage is seeking to raise more than $3 billion in a US initial public offering, people familiar with the matter said, in what would be the largest listing this year.】

item.title: 特鲁多的竞争对手反对提高资本利得税，承诺新的减税政策
item.description: 加拿大保守党领袖皮埃尔-波利瓦尔（Pierre Poilievre）表示，他将投票反对政府提高资本利得税含税税率的提议，从而结束了数周来人们对他在这一问题上的立场的猜测。【原文：Canadian Conservative Leader Pierre Poilievre said he will vote against the government’s proposal to raise the capital gains tax inclusion rate, ending weeks of speculation about where he would land on the issue.】

item.title: 尽管面临主要风险，国债拍卖仍吸引了强劲需求
item.description: 尽管周三可能会发生破坏稳定的事件，但 10 年期债券的拍卖还是吸引了异常强劲的需求，债券因此反弹，抹去了上周强劲的就业数据造成的部分损失。【原文：Bonds rallied — erasing some of the losses caused by last week’s strong employment data — after an auction of 10-year notes drew unusually strong demand despite its proximity to potentially destabilizing events on Wednesday.】

item.title: 法国央行下调经济增长预期，原因是预算削减被认为会产生影响
item.description: 法国央行下调了对未来两年经济增长的预测，因为其中包括对能源价格的更高假设，以及削减开支以弥补预算赤字对经济活动的打击。【原文：The Bank of France cut its growth forecasts for the next two years as it included higher assumptions for energy prices and a hit to activity from spending cuts to close down the budget deficit.】

item.title: 银行领导称房地产之痛仍局限于办公室
item.description: 富国银行（Wells Fargo & Co.）和 PNC 金融服务集团（PNC Financial Services Group Inc.【原文：Commercial real estate risks remain manageable across most sectors, though office buildings will continue to plague lenders, according to executives at Wells Fargo & Co. and PNC Financial Services Group Inc.】

item.title: Allied Properties 因写字楼空置问题被穆迪降至 "垃圾 "评级
item.description: 穆迪评级公司（Moody's Ratings）周二将 Allied Properties Real Estate 房地产公司的评级下调至垃圾级，理由是这家加拿大写字楼业主的债务水平较高，而且出租率下降将影响其履行债务的能力。【原文：Moody’s Ratings downgraded Allied Properties Real Estate to junk status on Tuesday, citing the Canadian office landlord’s high debt levels, as well as weakening occupancy rates that will weigh on its ability to meet its obligations.】

item.title: 财政风险扭曲了巴西掉期对加息的定价
item.description: 对巴西控制财政赤字能力的怀疑不断增加，引发了投资头寸的突然变化，扭曲了该国的掉期利率市场。【原文：Mounting skepticism over Brazil’s ability to control its fiscal deficit has triggered such sudden changes in investment positions that it has distorted the country’s swap rates market.】

item.title: 迈克尔-戴尔计划今年销售创纪录的 29 亿美元股票
item.description: 迈克尔-戴尔正在疯狂销售。【原文：Michael Dell is on a selling spree.】

item.title: CD&R牵头竞购制药商Stada，所有者寻求110亿欧元收购
item.description: 知情人士称，随着 Stada Arzneimittel AG 目前的所有者越来越接近于决定如何退出这家德国仿制药制造商，Clayton Dubilier & Rice 正在成为收购该公司的领跑者。【原文：Clayton Dubilier & Rice is emerging as frontrunner to acquire Stada Arzneimittel AG as its current owners move closer to a decision over how to exit the German generic drugmaker, people with knowledge of the matter said.】

item.title: CPI 和美联储猜测推动美元升至 2024 年高点
item.description: 由于市场猜测周三的美国通胀数据和美联储的政策决定将增加需求，美元正升至年内新高。【原文：The dollar is rising toward a new high for the year on speculation that Wednesday’s US inflation reading and Federal Reserve policy decision will increase demand.】

item.title: 欧盟寻求加快清洁能源转型并遏制从俄罗斯进口液化天然气
item.description: 欧盟行政机构将开始推动加强其能源安全，加速摆脱化石燃料进口，同时与遏制俄罗斯液化天然气供应的棘手任务搏斗。【原文：The European Union’s executive will begin a push to strengthen its energy security and accelerate the shift away from fossil fuel imports, while wrestling with the tricky task of curbing supplies of Russian liquefied natural gas.】

item.title: 派拉蒙的竞标者：想收购电影制片厂的人都在这里
item.description: 派拉蒙全球公司的收购战已经打响六个月，至少有五家潜在收购方出现在这家历史悠久的影视公司面前。【原文：Six months into the battle to acquire Paramount Global, at least five potential suitors have emerged for the storied film and TV company.】

item.title: 埃尼启动出售 Saipem 10%股份的交易，价值 4.1 亿欧元
item.description: 据一份声明称，埃尼公司（Eni SpA）开始出售其持有的海上钻井服务公司Saipem SpA 10%的股份，价值约4.1亿欧元（4.4亿美元）。【原文：Eni SpA started to sell a 10% stake it owns in offshore drilling services company Saipem SpA worth about €410 million ($440 million), according to a statement.】

item.title: Freeport-McMoRan 首席执行官表示正在寻找扩大铜产量的方法
item.description: 美国铜业巨头自由港麦克莫兰公司（Freeport-McMoRan Inc. 新任首席执行官凯瑟琳-柯克（Kathleen Quirk）表示，该公司相信通过在现有资产中应用新的加工技术，可以释放出相当于一个大型新矿的产能。【原文：US copper giant Freeport-McMoRan Inc. believes it can unlock the equivalent of a large new mine by applying new processing technology at its existing assets, according to new Chief Executive Officer Kathleen Quirk.】

item.title: 墨西哥比索跌幅扩大，阿姆鲁推动快速司法改革
item.description: 安德烈斯-曼努埃尔-洛佩斯-奥夫拉多尔（Andres Manuel Lopez Obrador）总统加倍强调了司法改革的重要性，称司法改革可能在他9月30日任期结束前获得批准。【原文：President Andres Manuel Lopez Obrador doubled down on the importance of a judicial reform that critics fear would erode checks on Mexico’s ruling party, saying it could be approved before his term ends on Sept. 30.】

item.title: Makhlouf 警告称，爱尔兰房地产震荡可能会被基金放大
item.description: 爱尔兰中央银行警告说，如果房地产基金在经济下滑期间被迫出售资产，那么这些基金持有的大量爱尔兰商业房地产可能会放大市场压力。【原文：The large share of Irish commercial real estate held by property funds could amplify market stress if those funds are forced to sell assets during a downturn, the country’s central bank has warned.】

item.title: 纽约肯尼迪机场斥资 15 亿美元改造航站楼
item.description: 约翰-肯尼迪国际机场（John F. Kennedy International Airport）正在寻求资金帮助其建设新一号航站楼，这使其成为在机场债券热潮中寻求投资者的最新设施。【原文：John F. Kennedy International Airport is seeking funds to help it build its New Terminal One, making it the latest facility to tap investors amid an airport bond boom.】

item.title: 热门对冲基金交易将比特币期货空头推向创纪录水平
item.description: 在杠杆基金中，比特币期货的净空头创下了历史新高，但不要误以为这是对冲基金的压倒性看跌情绪。这更可能是由于一种日益流行的市场中性策略。【原文：Bitcoin futures are seeing a record high in net short interest among leveraged funds, yet don’t mistake that for an overwhelming sense of bearishness among hedge funds. It’s more likely due to an increasingly popular market-neutral strategy.】

item.title: 美国因黄金调查制裁圭亚那富豪穆罕默德家族
item.description: 美国财政部办公室周二制裁了 Nazar Mohamed、他的儿子 Azruddin 及其公司 Mohamed's Enterprise，指控他们在圭亚那公共腐败中扮演了重要角色。【原文：The US Treasury’s Office sanctioned Nazar Mohamed, his son Azruddin and their company Mohamed’s Enterprise on Tuesday for their alleged roles in public corruption in Guyana.】

item.title: 英国劳动力自 2019 年以来在保守党统治下停滞不前
item.description: 在英国劳动力市场经历了黯淡的四年之后，首相苏纳克（Rishi Sunak）正在为自己的政治生存而战。【原文：Prime Minister Rishi Sunak is fighting for his political survival after a bleak four years for the UK labor market.】

item.title: 利率居高不下，美国货币基金看淡改革忧虑
item.description: 美国货币市场基金行业仍在享受美国利率长期走高带来的推动力，同时也摆脱了今年晚些时候即将生效的改革所带来的风险。【原文：The US money-market fund industry is still enjoying a boost from higher-for-longer US interest rates, shrugging off risk tied to reforms set to take effect later this year.】

item.title: 树莓派终于在伦敦股市闪亮登场
item.description: 个人电脑生产商树莓派（Raspberry Pi）的首次亮相，至少暂时淹没了伦敦对股票市场萎缩的哀叹。【原文：London’s lament over a shrinking equity market has been drowned out — for the moment at least — by the stellar trading debut of personal computer maker Raspberry Pi.】

item.title: Pimco 对银行和华创企业的警告敲响了 "更高更长期利率 "风险的警钟
item.description:
摩根大通的斯蒂利表示，创纪录的加息周期所带来的影响仍是一个威胁

item.title: 恩库贝说：津巴布韦寻求外国银行推出绿色债券
item.description: 津巴布韦财政部长姆图利-恩库比（Mthuli Ncube）表示，津巴布韦已请求外国贷款机构帮助其通过债券筹集资金，因为津巴布韦没有能够推动此类工作的本地机构。【原文：Zimbabwe has asked foreign lenders to help it raise funds through bonds because it doesn’t have local institutions that can drive such efforts, Finance Minister Mthuli Ncube said.】

item.title: SBB 面临反弹，ISS 建议投票反对董事长
item.description: 一位有影响力的代理顾问称，投资者应投票反对公司任命新董事长的提议，陷入困境的瑞典房东 SBB 将在本月底与股东摊牌。【原文：Struggling Swedish landlord SBB is set for a showdown with shareholders at the end of the month after an influential proxy adviser said investors should vote against the company’s proposal to appoint a new chairman.】

item.title: 国际货币基金组织（IMF）称，提高资本利得税是一个开始，但加拿大需要更多收入
item.description: 国际货币基金组织（International Monetary Fund）表示，贾斯汀-特鲁多（Justin Trudeau）总理上调资本利得税将改善系统的中立性，不会对投资或生产率增长造成重大损害，但他的政府必须采取更多措施来增加收入和收紧财政政策。【原文：The International Monetary Fund says Prime Minister Justin Trudeau’s capital gains tax hike will improve the system’s neutrality and won’t significantly harm investment or productivity growth, but his government must do more to boost revenue and tighten fiscal policy.】

item.title: 哈贝克称乌克兰天然气过境协议不会助普京一臂之力
item.description: 德国经济部长罗伯特-哈贝克（Robert Habeck）表示，欧洲正在进行 "紧张 "的工作，以确保天然气通过一条关键的俄罗斯-乌克兰输油管道，同时寻求一种不会让克里姆林宫国库吃不饱的解决方案。【原文：German economy minister Robert Habeck said Europe is engaged in “intense” work to keep gas flowing through a key Russia-Ukraine pipeline as it seeks a solution that doesn’t fill the Kremlin’s coffers.】

item.title: 英伟达超越苹果，670 亿美元 ETF 基金面临剧烈动荡
item.description: 在英伟达公司（Nvidia Corp. ）规模超过苹果公司（Apple Inc.【原文：One of the world’s biggest tech ETFs looks poised for a shake-up after Nvidia Corp. catapulted past Apple Inc. in size.】

item.title: 欧洲准备将巴塞尔银行交易规则推迟一年实施
item.description: 据熟知内情的人士透露，欧盟将把全球银行资本规则的关键部分推迟一年，这样欧盟的贷款机构就不会因美国在标准问题上的持续争论而处于不利地位。【原文：The European Union is set to delay key parts of global bank capital rules by a year, so that the bloc’s lenders will not be disadvantaged by continued wrangling over the standards in the US, according to people familiar with the matter.】
